Salem Bass Fishing
August 2 at 7:34 PM 路

The two groups of Salem kids fishing the IBF trail stop on their own both had good days on the water. Zion and Braden had the fish to win the event with 11-2, but forgot to check in with the tournament official while loading the boat up. (You live and you learn, good work on the water and keep your heads up!) Laken and Blake also got the right bites as well today and ended up 4th out of 24 boats! They were one small cull away from winning and had 5 solid fish today. Great job to both groups on putting together solid limits and on to the next one.

NOTE: We would love to qualify for the CEP program for SMS and SHS. How can you help? Our qualification depends on our Direct Certification percentage as of April 1 of the previous school year.

If your household includes anyone receiving TANF or SNAP benefits OR you are experiencing a loss of permanent housing, you may qualify as a Direct Certification household.

The higher the percentage of direct certification an individual school can show, the closer we can get to qualifying for the CEP program for that individual building.
